targets.expr:
sum by (app)
(rate(equinox_op_seconds_count{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m]))

panels.description: Amount of RU/s consumed by successful operations carried out via Equinox Transact or Query operations

targets.expr:
sum by (app)
(rate(equinox_op_ru_sum{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m]))

panels.title: CosmosDB Consumption

panels.description: Latency per Transact / Query operation (may involve >1 roundtrip in some cases)

targets.expr:
sum by (app, facet, quantile)
(equinox_op_summary_seconds{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", facet=~"$facet"})

panels.title: Latency p99/95/50

panels.description: RU charges per Equinox internal operation (in some cases this may be the result of >1 roundtrip)

targets.expr:
sum by (app, facet, quantile)
(equinox_op_summary_ru{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", facet=~"$facet"})

panels.title: CosmosDB Request Charges p99/95/50

panels.description: Equinox Operation counts, grouped by Facet and Category

targets.expr:
sum by (cat, facet)
(rate(equinox_op_seconds_count{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m]))

panels.title: Traffic (Equinox CosmosDb Operations)

panels.description: Equinox-incurred RU charges, grouped by Facet and Category

targets.expr:
sum by (cat, facet)
(rate(equinox_op_ru_sum{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m]))

panels.title: Saturation (Equinox CosmosDB Load)

targets.expr: sum(rate(equinox_op_seconds_bucket{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m])) by (le)
sum(rate(equinox_op_ru_bucket{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m])) by (le)
sum(rate(equinox_op_seconds_bucket{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m])) by (le)
sum(rate(equinox_op_ru_bucket{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m])) by (le)
sum(rate(equinox_op_seconds_bucket{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m])) by (le)
sum(rate(equinox_op_ru_bucket{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m])) by (le)

sum by (facet, quantile)
(equinox_op_summary_seconds{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", facet=~"$facet"})

sum by (facet, quantile)
(equinox_op_summary_ru{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", facet=~"$facet"})

sum by (cat, op)
(rate(equinox_op_seconds_count{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m]))

sum by (cat, facet)
(rate(equinox_op_ru_sum{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m]))

sum by (facet, outcome)
(rate(equinox_payload_events_total{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m]))

sum by (facet, outcome)
(rate(equinox_payload_bytes_total{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m]))

sum by (cat, facet, op, outcome)
(rate(equinox_payload_events_total{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m]))

sum by (cat, facet, op, outcome)
(rate(equinox_payload_bytes_total{sys=~"$sys", sub=~"$sub", app=~"$application", db=~"$database", con=~"$container", cat=~"$category", facet=~"$facet", op=~"$operation"}[1m]))
